messages.title: Only the Lib Dems can stop the SNP here
messages.content: Residents in Edinburgh West know that whatever happens across the rest of the country, the race to be the next MP for Edinburgh West is between Mike Crockart and the SNP.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The race to be the next MP for Edinburgh West is between Mike Crockart and the SNP.

leaflet.personalStatement: I will be casting my vote for Mike as he is the only person who can beat the SNP. The Scottish people gave a clear majority against independence but the SNP have sought to ignore the result.

endorsements.endorsement: That is why he has my vote.
I will be casting my vote for Mike as he is the only person who can beat the SNP. The Scottish people gave a clear majority against independence but the SNP have sought to ignore the result.
Mike will continue to work hard for local residents if he is re-elected as our MP. Mike understands the local issues and never takes our votes for granted.

quotes.text: Mike understands the local issues and never takes our votes for granted.

images.caption: It's a two-horse race in Edinburgh West Only Mike Crockart can stop the SNP
